name: HTTP Requests
content: This lesson covers the fundamentals of HTTP requests in web development.

name: Routes
content: In this lesson, you'll learn about defining routes in your Express.js application.

name: API
content: The API lesson explores building and interacting with APIs in backend development.

name: Express
content: Learn the basics of Express.js, a popular Node.js web framework, in this lesson.

name: Middlewares
content: This lesson delves into the concept of middlewares and how they enhance Express.js applications.
